metadata.name: PAUSE
metadata.description:
A skateboarder hung suspended mid-air as if he were weightless. It was like gravity had lost its grip on him. For that one brief moment, nothing else seemed to matter. The whole world paused, and all the sounds around him quietly faded into the background, leaving just him, his skateboard, and a feeling of pure freedom that made the countless hours of practice, falls, and multiple injuries worth it. Skate was his true love, and love is life.

------------------------------------------------

Edition: 1/1

------------------------------------------------
